h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: To meet the fox, progress through Chapter 3 until you get to the Valley of Ectascy section, which is toward the end. You'll eventually slide down a snowy slope, and arrive at the Forest of Felicity. To the left of the Forest of Felicity Keeper's Shrine, you'll see a skeletal body slumped against a post at the start of a wooden path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox'.
The content is as follows:
To meet the fox, progress through Chapter 3 until you get to the Valley of Ectascy section, which is toward the end. You'll eventually slide down a snowy slope, and arrive at the Forest of Felicity. To the left of the Forest of Felicity Keeper's Shrine, you'll see a skeletal body slumped against a post at the start of a wooden path.
